8308.HK.summary: Gudou Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates and manages hot spring resort and hotel facilities in Guangdong Province, the People's Republic of China. It operates through two segments, Property Development, and Hotel and Resort Operation. The company also develops and sells tourism properties, such as villas, high-rise apartments, low-rise apartments, low-rise studio flats, and retail units in Gudou Hot Spring Resort, as well as operates entertainment facilities, such as a spa center, a conference center, the Natural Spring Waterpark, and a karaoke club in the resort. In addition, it provides consultancy and/or management services to leisure hotels and resorts, and other hot spring resort operators; properties renovation services; and property management services. The company was formerly known as Gudou International Holdings Limited and changed its name to Gudou Holdings Limited in October 2015. Gudou Holdings Limited was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Jiangmen, the People's Republic of China.

MCG.V.summary: Melco China Resorts (Holding) Limited develops and operates ski resorts in China. Its portfolio includes Sun Mountain Yabuli, Sky Mountain Beidahu, The Lotus Mountain Club, Adventure Mountain Changchun, and Star Mountain Beijing resort properties in Beijing, Heilongjiang Province, and Jilin Province. The company offers a range of accommodations, including full-service hotels, condominium-hotels, and luxury resort homes. Melco China Resorts (Holding) Limited is based in Beijing, China.
